actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to redesignate the boundaries of Colorado National Monument in the State of Colorado.

summary.text: Revises the boundaries of Colorado National Monument, Colorado. Authorizes the acquisition of lands located within such redesignated boundaries. Authorizes the appropriation of such funds as are necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to redesignate the boundaries of Colorado National Monument in the State of Colorado.
